class.name: FieldElement

javadoc.param: <T> * the type of the field elements

javadoc.return: a new element representing this + a
a new element representing this - a

javadoc.text: Returns the additive inverse of {@code this} element.
Compute n × this. Multiplication by an integer number is defined * as the following sum * <center> * n × this = ∑<sub>i=1</sub><sup>n</sup> this. * </center>
javadoc.param: n Number of times {@code this} must be added to itself.
javadoc.return: A new element representing n × this.
a new element representing this × a
a new element representing this ÷ a

javadoc.text: Returns the multiplicative inverse of {@code this} element.
Get the {@link Field} to which the instance belongs.
javadoc.return: {@link Field} to which the instance belongs
